Description: Painted pottery shabti of Sobkmes Wʿb n Amun with a black lappet-wig tied with a decorated fillet, a brown modelled face with black eyes, a white body, a red, black and green collar, parallel brown hands in low relief holding two brown hoes, the back is decorated with two brown seed-bags; the front of the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in six rows of black painted Hieroglyphs separated by red lines; the foot has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - foot missing, damage to surface
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
